mapper.sql: id, landlord, phone, address, community, status, del, modifiedDate
mapper.insert: insert into h_landlord (id, landlord, phone, address, community, status, del,modifiedDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landlord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into h_landlord
id,
landlord,
phone,
address,
community,
status,
del,
modifiedDate,

mapper.update:
update h_landlord
landlord = #{landlord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
community = #{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update h_landlord set landlord = #{landlord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community = #{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id, landlord, phone, address, community, status, del, modifiedDate from h_landlord where del = 0
and ( phone like "%"#{value}"%" or community like "%"#{value}"%" or landlord like "%"#{value}"%" )
and status = #{status}
order by modifiedDate desc
